            </div>

    <div id="commentslistp2978889" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16848689">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16848689">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16848689">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I get the Full-text of my article?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10472987">
          <p>
           To get the Full-Text of an article:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in a library database with "Check for full text" buttons, click on "Check for full text". It will take you the full text of your article or tell you that the full-text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library,
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           the book or article
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (journal title, year, title, etc.), type the information about your article in the
           <a title="Citation Help Page" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/atoztitles/search?#article">
            Article Locator citation page
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to tthe article. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. Look to the far right of the article's title to see if there is a link to a freely available copy.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10472987" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16848692">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16848692">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16848692">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10472943">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10472943">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10472943">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10472943">
          <div id="boxatt10472943" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12729975">
              Routledge Encyclopedia of Philosophy
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The standard philosophy reference. Extensive bibliographies. Location: Trexler Library call #103 R869e
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730249">
              <a id="link_12730249" href="http://www.iep.utm.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730249,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Philosophy', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730249}); ">
               Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Peer-reviewed open-access encyclopedia.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730296">
              <a id="link_12730296" href="http://plato.stanford.edu/about.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730296,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Philosophy', 'page_name' : 'Reference Works'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730296}); ">
               Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Peer-reviewed open-access encyclopedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
